page.title: 19St.Lucia's Primary School
page.content: The old school was built around 1860, and the new school was built in 1974. At the old school,people used outside toilets called earth closets. You can see the sheds where the earth closets used to be. The old school had two classrooms.The old school is now a private house.The juniors had quite a big room which is now a sittingroom and the infants had a very small room which is now a kitchen. At the old school there was not a field or playground so the children went to the village hall, and played on the field there. That was soon tarmaced and made into a playground. Some of the playground is still there today. Hot meals were supplied at Upton Magna village hall.Hot meals are now being made and served from the school kitchen. At the old school there are crosses on the roof, these crosses
